text:
@BBCPanorama Coronavirus: UK failed to stockpile crucial #PPE There were no gowns, visors, swabs or body bags in the govt's pandemic stockpile when #Covid19 reached the UK, @BBCPanorama has uncovered.

The gov said it has taken the right steps and is doing everything it can to increase stocks
